boilerroom: The name of the extension's entry in Special:SpecialPages
br-default-box-label: Default label for boilerroombox edit button.
br-create-boilerplates: Heading for the creating boilerplates section on Special:Boilerplate.
br-create-std-bp: Heading for standard boilerplates section of Special:Boilerplate
br-meta-std-box-label: Label for the create standard boilerplate button on Special:Boilerplate.
br-create-std-bp-desc: Small paragraph describing what standard boilerplates are that appears on Special:Boilerplate beneath the box to create these boilerplates.
br-meta-std-bp-page: Default page title for the metaboilerplate for standard boilerplates.
br-meta-std-bp: Fallback boilerplate text for a metaboilerplate for standard boilerplates. Only comment text should be translated; markup should be left intact.
br-create-wrap-bp: Heading for wrapping boilerplates section of Special:Boilerplate
br-meta-wrap-box-label: Label for the create wrapping boilerplate button on Special:Boilerplate.
br-create-wrap-bp-desc: Small paragraph describing what wrapping boilerplates are that appears on Special:Boilerplate beneath the box to create these boilerplates.
br-meta-wrap-bp-page: Default page title for the metaboilerplate for wrapping boilerplates.
br-meta-wrap-bp: Fallback boilerplate text for a metaboilerplate for wrapping boilerplates. Only comment text should be translated; markup should be left intact.
br-boilerplate-list: Heading for the boilerplate list on Special:Boilerplate
br-boilerplate-list-desc: Text before the list on Special:Boilerplate explaining this lists pages in the Boilerplate namespace.
br-boilerplate-list-none: Text in the list on Special:Boilerplate that appears if there are no pages in the Boilerplate namespace.
br-boilerplate-list-note: Text below the list on Special:Boilerplate that explains pages outside the Boilerplates may be set up as boilerplates, but they are not listed there.
br-selector-legend: Legend for the large boilerplate selector.
br-selector-insert: Tooltip for the insert at cursor button.
br-selector-prepend: Tooltip for the insert at beginning button.
br-selector-append: Tooltip for the insert at end button.
br-selector-replace: Tooltip for the replace existing text button.
br-selector-edit: Tooltip for the edit selected boilerplate button.
br-selector-create: Tooltip for the create or manage boilerplates button.
br-replace-confirm: Confirmation prompt when replacing text in the editbox. Warns that the undo feature may not be able to reverse it.
br-page-exists-noajax: Error message indicating boilerplate cannot be loaded on an existing page. (True for some wiki configurations).
br-page-exists-ajax: Message indicating a page already exists and advises boilerplates can be selected.
br-loaded-on-new-page: Message indicating a boilerplate was loaded onto a new page. $1 is the page name of the boilerplate without namespace.
br-insert: Message indicating a boilerplate was inserted at the cursor. $1 is the page name of the boilerplate without namespace.
br-prepend: Message indicating a boilerplate inserted at the beginning. $1 is the page name of the boilerplate without namespace.
br-append: Message indicating a boilerplate inserted at the end. $1 is the page name of the boilerplate without namespace.
br-replace: Message indicating a boilerplate was used to replace existing text. $1 is the page name of the boilerplate without namespace.
br-no-boilerplates: Message that appears in the selector or where it usually appears, explaining there are no boilerplates in the Boilerplate namespace to make available.
br-load-boilerplate: Label for the button in the noscript selector that loads a boilerplate onto a new page.
br-tag-error: Error message output when one of the boilerplate tags can't be processed on a boilerplate page due to misuse.
